src:
高材生嫖妓變業配網紅　出道拍AV前卻慘染性病
07 Nov 2019, 01:40 by 娛樂組
日本名校「早稻田」學生篠塚康介之前因為上網分享買春經驗成名，又放話想當「日本第一AV男優」，結果現在是風俗界的爆紅人物，不僅到風俗店嫖免錢，還因此接到許多業配。
只是原本篠塚康介今年夏天準備正式AV出道，結果卻染了性病，讓他星途暫時夢碎，近來他在當地電視節目受訪時也分享，要等到自己痊癒，之後才能順利展開自己的色情片第一砲。
一名AV製作人曾經對篠塚康介分析，日本目前只有80名男優，卻有成千上萬女優，正式他投入成人產業的最佳時機。不過篠塚康介正面臨嚴重的家庭革命，目前已經離家，靠著寫作與朋友幫忙才能維生。
其實篠塚康介去年夏天還是處男，但因在街頭想嫖妓被騙了錢，他憤而到處花錢找女人、甚至「到府服務」一洩怨氣，並將心得po文，結果因此成為網紅。由於他完全沒有掩飾真實姓名以及身分，遭人向學校舉報，結果老師沒有懲處，反而大讚他的文筆很好。
更新時間｜2019.11.07 01:38
text:
High-quality 嫖妓 嫖妓 业 配 配 配 出 出 出 AV AV AV AV AV AV
07 Nov 2019, 01:40 by Entertainment Group
Former Japanese school "Waseda" student Kou Kangsuke had become famous because of sharing the experience of buying spring, and he wanted to be "Japan's first AV male". The result is now a red-hot character in the customs, not only to the customs store, but also to avoid money, so To many industries.
It was just that Kane, who was preparing for the official AV debut this summer, ended up with a sexually transmitted disease, which made him a bit of a dream. He recently shared it when he was interviewed on local TV shows. He had to wait until he recovered, before he could successfully launch his own porn. The first shot.
An AV producer once analyzed the analysis of Kuang Kangsuke. There are only 80 males in Japan, but there are thousands of females, and he is the best time to enter the adult industry. However, Kang Kang is facing a serious family revolution. He is now away from home and can survive by writing and helping with friends.
In fact, Kang Kang was still a virgin last summer, but because he wanted to be defrauded in the streets, he was angry and went to spend money to find a woman, or even "go to the government service" to vent their grievances, and would have a confession, and the result became a net red. Since he did not cover up his real name and identity at all, he was reported to the school. As a result, the teacher did not punish him. Instead, he praised his writing very well.
Update time|2019.11.07 01:38
